description: Join Stablecoin Standard, Utila, and Gravity Team at Cardinal Point Rooftop Bar on 11 February for drinks, bites, and great conversations across the stablecoin ecosystem. No panels. No long presentations. Just straight networking with THE movers and shakers from across the stablecoin industry, and rooftop views. Stablecoins are moving fast. Come meet the people building what s next. Spots are limited so RSVP early. By signing up to this event, you agree to be
